context: Mendes revealed that <b6_0>production<b6_0/> would begin on 8 December 2014 at <a2_0><a5_0>Pinewood Studios<a5_0/><a2_0/>, with <b7_0>filming<b7_0/> taking <a3_0>seven months.<a3_0/> Mendes also confirmed several filming locations, including <a0_0>London, Mexico City and Rome<a0_0/>. <b8_0>Van Hoytema<b8_0/> shot the film on <a1_0><a4_0>Kodak 35 mm<a1_0/> film stock<a4_0/>. Early filming took place at <b9_0>Pinewood<b9_0/> Studios, and around London, with scenes variously featuring Craig and Harris at Bond's flat, and Craig and Kinnear travelling down the River Thames.
